start.text: Are those people *licensed*? No? Very well then.
I love a good cease and desist order.
This looks like a problem for my lawyers.

start_boss.text: My lawyers have advised me to *not* partake in this fight.
Risk analysis says that this might be a bit... problematic.

retreat.text: Lets disengage before the profit margin is gone!

engaged.text: There they are. Tell them about our *great* deals.

out_of_missiles.text: Out of expendables - aside from the interns.

pursuing.text: And now we move to aggressive negotiations.
Did they really think they could get away?
That's not a businesslike spirit. Keep on them.

running.text: Alright $commanderLastName, see you at the stock-taking meeting!
We'll have to re-evaluate our portfolio after this.

hull_50.text: The intern block just got vented to space.

hull_30.text: This is past my margin of comfort now!
Do we need a damn seminar on keeping allies alive?!

overload.text: Too much input! Not enough output!
Get me the tech support line!
Overload?! I thought that was supposed to be fixed!

death.text: Don't forget to mark us down as a loss on your taxes $commanderHonorific.
This best not go on my performance review!
Get to the lifeboats! Management and Executives first!

victory.text: I guess we can call the lawyers off.

victory_boss.text: I knew those lawyers were chickenshit. No problems at all.
